meanings.sent1: The little girl looked sad when her ice cream fell on the ground.
meanings.sent2: It is normal to feel sad when saying goodbye to a friend.
meanings.sent3: The sad puppy tried to howl but ended up sneezing instead.
meanings.sent4: The sad melody of the violin echoed through the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The gray clouds painted a sad picture in the sky.

meanings.definition: Causing or characterized by sorrow or regret
meanings.sent1: The sad news of the accident spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent2: The broken vase was a sad reminder of the argument they had.
meanings.sent3: The sad movie made everyone in the room tear up, even the tough guy.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a sad, eerie feeling about it.
meanings.sent5: The old, worn-out teddy bear had a sad expression on its face.
